items.sentence: I was surprised to find out that Tom could speak French.
If you don't bring a gift, you'll make a bad impression.
There was a murder in my apartment building last summer.
There's no use screaming for help. Nobody will hear you.
Which shirt did you buy, the blue one or the yellow one?
I've only read about half the books on the bottom shelf.
All four of my grandparents were native French speakers.
Tom ordered three hot dogs for himself and one for Mary.
Tom is hoping everybody will leave, so he can go to bed.
How could I have told Tom without telling everyone else?
